results.title: Sammy Blue
results.creator_credit: Isabel Perez, Kim Farrant and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
Sammy Blue is a young boy who wants to escape from the white noise of reality in his everyday life. If only he could be just like his goldfish “Blue” and swim around the bowl – forgetting everything, living moment by moment.
Features Andrew S. Gilbert as father, Claire Paradine as mother, William Balmford as Sammy and Zoe Carides as Mary.

results.title: Joy
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Rachel Clements and Cate Shortland
results.brief_description:
Thursday night. Late night shopping. Joy wants to have fun. This film follows a teenage girl as she hits the town in search of a good time. But Joy’s search for fulfillment leaves her lost and lonely at the end of the evening as we follow her to her unhappy home. By the director of ‘Somersault’ (2004). Original format 35mm/colour.
WARNING: This film contains scenes that may offend some viewers.

results.title: Intransit
results.creator_credit: Isabel Perez, Mike Daly and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
A boy journeys into his own dark underworld where he is confronted by the vengeful father of his imagination.
Features Louis Westgarth as Ben, James Hagen as Ben’s father and Humphrey Westgarth as young Ben.

results.title: Into the night
results.creator_credit: Rachel Clements, Melissa Johnston, Tony Krawitz and AFTRS
results.brief_description: A lost and fragile boy new to the streets. A wary teenager just thinking about the money. A wealthy man playing out a delicate and lonely game. Over one night their lives intersect in unexpected ways, blurring the line between betrayer and betrayed.

results.title: Binary
results.creator_credit: Rachel Roberts, Mike Daly and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
Trapped in a cell of fear, Claire’s longing for connection propels her beyond the known world.
The world of Binary is neither a particular time or place, it is Claire’s headspace. The images, sounds and content of the film always represent Claire’s mental state, they are completely subjective. Digital visual effects were employed in the production of Binary to assist this approach and to portray Claire’s increasingly unstable view of her world.
Features Susan Prior as Claire and Briden Aspinall as the young girl.

results.title: Together in the middle of nowhere
results.creator_credit: Rachel Clements, Tony Krawitz and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Vince embarks on an odyssey through the city streets while his girlfriend Jacqui works in a stripclub until dawn. Over one night they journey into the darkness of their own hearts to find out what really matters. Cast includes Mark Priestley as Vince and Hayley McElhinney as Jacqui

results.title: Placement
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Sarah Warner and Bill Chen
results.brief_description:
Sometime in the future, Max lives with his only daughter, Ruby, in an apartment complex where he spends all his time working. But his life is shattered when Ruby chases her balloon off the edge and falls to the street below.
He is offered the chance to clone her and puts his strong religious beliefs aside in order to have his daughter back, but the new Ruby is not the same.

results.title: Pending
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Paola Garofali and Anna Tow
results.brief_description: In this fantasy animation, Jasmine flees her war-torn country for the safety of the towering City of Anchors. But between her traumatic past and her hopes for a new life, Jasmine must first face a heartless Immigration Department bureaucrat and persuade him to let her stay. Original Format 35 mm/colour.
